## Lesson Content

* Characteristics of time-series data
* A short visual history of time-series graphs
* Time-series patterns
* Time-series data visualization Methods
    * Line graph
    * Control chart
    * Candlestick chart
    * Slopegraph
    * Cycle plot
    * Horizon graph
    * Sunburst diagram
    * Calendar Heatmap
    * Stream Graph
* Interactive techniques for time-series data visualisation
* Animation techniques for time-series visualisation

## Readings

* [Visualizing Change: An Innovation in Time-Series Analysis](http://www.perceptualedge.com/articles/visual_business_intelligence/visualizing_change.pdf)
* [The Development of the Horizon Graph](http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download;jsessionid=08076DD0A1346CB0F3AE2A98A5FB17A0?doi=10.1.1.363.5396&rep=rep1&type=pdf)
